tool.name: BioPerl Converter
tool.description: Convert between different bio file formats using BioPerl
tool.command: source \$HOME/perl5/perlbrew/etc/bashrc; perl \$HOME/webUI/proportal/script/bioperl_converter.pl --infile "$input" #if $conversionType.type == "fasta2phy": --from fasta --to phylip --outfile "$outputPhylip" #end if #if $conversionType.type == "phy2fasta": --from phylip --to fasta --outfile "$outputFasta" #end if #if $conversionType.type == "nhxtnd2nhx": --from nhxtnd --to nhx --outfile "$outputNhx" #end if

param.name: type
param.label: Select a conversion type
param.option: tree: New Hampshire eXtended to Newick

param.name: input
param.label: New Hampshire eXtended format file to convert

tool.help: This tool converts between different bio file formats to enable different tools to work together.
